titleStmt.title: Great Britain's coasting-pilot. The first part being a new and exact survey of the sea-coast of England from the River of Thames to the westward with the islands of Scilly and from thence to Carlile ... with directions for coming into the channel between England and France / by Captain Greenville Collins, hydrographer in ordinary to the King and Queens most excellent Majesties.
titleStmt.author: Collins, Greenville, fl. 1679-1693.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Freeman Collins and are to be sold by Richard Mount,

notesStmt.note: With: Great Britain's coasting-pilot : the second part ... England and Scotland from the River of Thames to the northwards with the islands of Orkney and Shetland.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
